events.name: Hack-O-Hack
events.about:
What is Hack-O-Hack?

Crush your mind and mess with codes for 48hours non- stop hackathon festival. Play with your ideas and bring the stunning apps and ideas. Hungry for the place to showcase your fresh ideas we invite you to take your seat in hackathon.  Let the world know your geek codes

Why to attend Hack-O-Hack

This is knowledge sharing hub for business users, developers and students.  Developers given an opportunity to showcase their new ideas in web and mobile development, also they can learn new technology.

If you are a start up business user, Developer or a student hack o hack is the place to deliver your business ideas and get linked with the leading sponsors.

Prizes

Participants are offered with goodies, to add spicy to the event we have come up with attractive rewards session to encourage the participants.  

1st place

Cash prize of $1880

2nd place

Cash prize of $940

3rd place

Cash prize of $470

Special prizes

Suprise gifts for the best idea and much more
